alert.note: Alert for Avoyelles; Evangeline; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 6:43PM CST until February 08 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Evangeline Parish in central Louisiana... Southeastern Avoyelles Parish in central Louisiana... Northeastern St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 643 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Washington, or 7 miles north of Opelousas, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Ville Platte, Simmesport, Palmetto, Bayou Current, Washington, Big Cane, Goudeau, Prairie Ronde, Grand Prairie, Lebeau and Dupont. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 24 and 38. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central Louisiana.
